episode.title: Robotitize the Assembly
episode.rawTitle: 103: ‘Robotitize the Assembly’ With Guest Dan Frommer
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Dan Frommer joins the show to talk about prop bets in Vegas, more *Star Wars*, some follow-up on James Bond, what Apple should do with its mountain of cash, speculation on why iPad sales growth has stagnated, and more. Also, some in-depth segments on Instagram and the concept of “institutional taste”.
